forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: owned boards not openning through "link"

comments.text: i kinda get this, but at the same time its a nuisace to me because i cant check if my links are working for others, and by links i mean like a button in my world and in boards
thanks for the note and could you please explain some more the issue?
sorry i was half asleep while typing that but what i meant was when i posted a link to my boards like [board:bugs and glitches] it wouldn't let me click it for that time but→
→afterwards after a few resets and other things it started letting me and now it instantly works, so i dunno what happened but i guess it fixed itself?
in the first release there was a bug there, sorry, it should now be fixed... let us know if it doesn't work again in the future please!
alrighty, i have yet to have a problem with it since, thank you! and i shall do my best to inform you as soon as possible!
